mapper.insert: insert into filesInfo ( fileId, fileName, fileType, fileSize, filePtah, uploadTime, attrUser, categoryId, state, remark ) values ( #{fileId}, #{fileName}, #{fileType}, #{fileSize}, #{filePtah}, sysdate(), #{attrUser}, #{categoryId}, #{state}, #{remark} )
mapper.select: select t.fileId, t.fileName, t.fileType, t.fileSize, t.filePtah, t.uploadTime, t.editTime, t.attrUser, t.categoryId, t.downloadTimes, t.state, t.remark from filesInfo t where t.fileId = #{fileId}
